==Reception==
==Reception==
â
MediaFire was recieved with overall good critics in the media, winning the award "Top 100 Undiscovered websites", by PC magazine<ref>[http://www.pcmag.com/slideshow_viewer/0,1205,l=213934&s=25234&a=213919&po=93,00.asp]</ref>, referred to as: "At first the MediaFire storage service seems too good to be true..."<ref>[http://www.cnet.com.au/broadband/0,239036008,339287726,00.htm]</ref> and also recieving posite reviews from [[Lifehacker]]<ref>[http://lifehacker.com/software/file-sharing/share-any-size-file-with-mediafire-209772.php]</ref>.
+
MediaFire was recieved with overall good critics in the media, winning the award "Top 100 Undiscovered websites", by PC magazine<ref>[http://www.pcmag.com/slideshow_viewer/0,1205,l=213934&s=25234&a=213919&po=93,00.asp]</ref>, referred to as: "At first the MediaFire storage service seems too good to be true..."by [[CNET]]<ref>[http://www.cnet.com.au/broadband/0,239036008,339287726,00.htm]</ref> and also recieving posite reviews from [[Lifehacker]]<ref>[http://lifehacker.com/software/file-sharing/share-any-size-file-with-mediafire-209772.php]</ref>.
